episodes.title: The Cult Church of Pastor Omotoso (miracle Maker)
episodes.description:
Man of God? or Predatory Cult Leader?
In this shocking exposé, we dive deep into the controversial world of Pastor Timothy Omotoso and his church, Jesus Dominion International. Once seen as a beacon of hope for many, Omotoso's church has been marred by allegations of human trafficking, sexual abuse, and manipulation.

This video uncovers the twisted power dynamics, psychological control, and devastating impact on young women who were lured into his inner circle under the guise of religious salvation. With personal testimonies, courtroom revelations, and expert insights, we explore the dangerous nature of this cult-like organization.

How did one man amass such influence, and how did so many lives get entangled in his deceptive web? Watch to find out the truth behind the headlines and why justice must prevail for the survivors.

If you or someone you know has been impacted by religious abuse, please reach out for help. Together, we can shine a light on these hidden horrors and stand with the victims.

Don’t forget to subscribe, like, and share to spread awareness!
